Source Ultimate Equipment pg. 20, PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 143

Statistics

Cost 20 gp Weight 6 lbs.

Damage 1d6/1d4 (small), 1d8/1d6 (medium); Critical x3/x4; Range -; Type B or P; Special double, trip

Category Two-Handed; Proficiency Exotic

Weapon Groups Double

Description

A gnome hooked hammer is a double weapon-an ingenious tool with a hammer head at one end of its haft and a long, curved pick at the other. The hammer's blunt head is a bludgeoning weapon that deals 1d6 points of damage (critical multiplier x3). Its hook is a piercing weapon that deals 1d4 points of damage (critical multiplier x4). You can use either head as the primary weapon. Gnomes treat hooked hammers as martial weapons.
